page.title: 19MEDIA IN THORNTON CLEVELEYS
page.content: AT SCHOOL I RAN A CENSUS TO SEE WHICH COMIC THE CLASS LIKED BEST.THE {BEANO}WAS MOST POPULAR WITH OVER HALF VOTING FOR IT.THIS COMIC HAS BEEN AROUND SINCE 1938 AND I DON'T KNOW WHY IT IS STILL SO POPULAR. A MUCH MORE MODERN COMIC IS THE ONE CALLED{2000 A.D.}FEATURING A LAWMAN CALLED {JUDGE DREDD}.THE COMIC HAS FIVE STORIES IN IT ALL OF WHICH ARE ABOUT PEOPLE IN THE FUTURE. ANOTHER POPULAR COMIC IS THE ONE CALLED{EAGLE AND TIGER.}IT HAS NINE STORIES EACH WEEK AND MANY ARE SET IN THE FUTURE. THE EDITOR OF 2000 A.D. ID AN ALIEN CALLED THARG AND THE EDITOR OF THE EAGLE AND TIGER A COMPUTER CALLED MAX. I WONDER IF YOU WILL HAVE COMICS ABOUT YOUR FUTURE OR WILL YOU BE MORE INTERESTED IN THE PAST?BY{SHAUN R.}
